module-item.name: d.barscale
module-item.description: Displays a barscale on the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.colorlist
module-item.description: Outputs a list of all available display colors.

module-item.name: d.colortable
module-item.description: Displays the color table associated with a raster map layer.

module-item.name: d.correlate
module-item.description: Prints a graph of the correlation between raster maps (in pairs).

module-item.name: d.erase
module-item.description: Erases the contents of the active graphics display frame with user defined color.

module-item.name: d.font
module-item.description: Selects the font in which text will be displayed on the user's graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.fontlist
module-item.description: Lists the available fonts.

module-item.name: d.frame
module-item.description: Manages display frames on the user's graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.geodesic
module-item.description: Displays a geodesic line, tracing the shortest distance between two geographic points along a great circle, in a longitude/latitude data set.

module-item.name: d.graph
module-item.description: Program for generating and displaying simple graphics on the display monitor.

module-item.name: d.grid
module-item.description: Overlays a user-specified grid in the active display frame on the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.his
module-item.description: Displays the result obtained by combining hue, intensity, and saturation (HIS) values from user-specified input raster map layers.

module-item.name: d.histogram
module-item.description: Displays a histogram in the form of a pie or bar chart for a user-specified raster map.

module-item.name: d.info
module-item.description: Displays information about the active display monitor. Display monitors are maintained by d.mon.

module-item.name: d.labels
module-item.description: Displays text labels (created with v.label) to the active frame on the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.legend
module-item.description: Displays a legend for a 2D or 3D raster map in the active frame of the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.legend.vect
module-item.description: Displays a vector legend in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.linegraph
module-item.description: Generates and displays simple line graphs in the active graphics monitor display frame.

module-item.name: d.mon
module-item.description: Controls graphics display monitors from the command line.

module-item.name: d.northarrow
module-item.description: Displays a north arrow on the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.out.file
module-item.description: Saves the contents of the active display monitor to a graphics file.

module-item.name: d.path
module-item.description: Finds shortest path for selected starting and ending node.

module-item.name: d.polar
module-item.description: Draws polar diagram of angle map such as aspect or flow directions

module-item.name: d.profile
module-item.description: Plots profile of a transect.

module-item.name: d.rast
module-item.description: Displays user-specified raster map in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.rast.arrow
module-item.description: Draws arrows representing cell aspect direction for a raster map containing aspect data.

module-item.name: d.rast.edit
module-item.description: Edits cell values in a raster map.

module-item.name: d.rast.leg
module-item.description: Displays a raster map and its legend on a graphics window

module-item.name: d.rast.num
module-item.description: Overlays cell category values on a raster map displayed in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.redraw
module-item.description: Redraws the content of currently selected monitor.

module-item.name: d.rgb
module-item.description: Displays three user-specified raster maps as red, green, and blue overlays in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.rhumbline
module-item.description: Displays the rhumbline joining two longitude/latitude coordinates.

module-item.name: d.shade
module-item.description: Drapes a color raster over an shaded relief or aspect map.

module-item.name: d.text
module-item.description: Draws text in the active display frame on the graphics monitor using the current font.

module-item.name: d.title
module-item.description: Create a TITLE for a raster map in a form suitable for display with d.text.

module-item.name: d.to.rast
module-item.description: Saves the contents of the active display monitor to a raster map.

module-item.name: d.vect
module-item.description: Displays user-specified vector map in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.vect.chart
module-item.description: Displays charts of vector data in the active frame on the graphics monitor.

module-item.name: d.vect.thematic
module-item.description: Displays a thematic vector map in the active graphics frame.

module-item.name: d.what.rast
module-item.description: Allows the user to interactively query raster map layers at user-selected locations.

module-item.name: d.what.vect
module-item.description: Allows the user to interactively query vector map layers at user-selected locations.

module-item.name: d.where
module-item.description: Identifies the geographic coordinates associated with point locations given in display coordinates.

module-item.name: db.columns
module-item.description: List all columns for a given table.

module-item.name: db.connect
module-item.description: Prints/sets general DB connection for current mapset.

module-item.name: db.copy
module-item.description: Copy a table. Either 'from_table' (optionally with 'where') can be used or 'select' option, but not 'from_table' and 'select' at the same time.

module-item.name: db.createdb
module-item.description: Creates an empty database.

module-item.name: db.databases
module-item.description: Lists all databases for a given driver and location.

module-item.name: db.describe
module-item.description: Describes a table in detail.

module-item.name: db.drivers
module-item.description: Lists all database drivers.

module-item.name: db.dropcolumn
module-item.description: Drops a column from selected attribute table.

module-item.name: db.dropdb
module-item.description: Removes an existing database.

module-item.name: db.droptable
module-item.description: Drops an attribute table.

module-item.name: db.execute
module-item.description: Executes any SQL statement. For SELECT statements use 'db.select'.

module-item.name: db.in.ogr
module-item.description: Imports attribute tables in various formats.

module-item.name: db.login
module-item.description: Sets user/password for DB driver/database.

module-item.name: db.out.ogr
module-item.description: Exports attribute tables into various formats.

module-item.name: db.select
module-item.description: Selects data from attribute table. Performs SQL query statement(s).

module-item.name: db.tables
module-item.description: Lists all tables for a given database.

module-item.name: db.test
module-item.description: Test database driver, database must exist and set by db.connect.

module-item.name: db.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics on selected table column.

module-item.name: g.access
module-item.description: Controls access to the current mapset for other users on the system. If no option given, prints current status.

module-item.name: g.copy
module-item.description: Copies available data files in the current mapset search path to the user's current mapset.

module-item.name: g.dirseps
module-item.description: Internal GRASS utility for converting directory separator characters. Converts any directory separator characters in the input string to or from native host format, and writes the changed path to standard output. Useful in scripts for Windows compatibility.

module-item.name: g.extension
module-item.description: Maintains GRASS Addons extensions in local GRASS installation. Downloads and installs extensions from GRASS Addons repository or other source into the local GRASS installation or removes installed extensions.

module-item.name: g.extension.all
module-item.description: Rebuilds or removes all locally installed GRASS Addons extensions. By default only extensions built against different GIS Library are rebuilt.

module-item.name: g.filename
module-item.description: Prints GRASS data base file names.

module-item.name: g.findetc
module-item.description: Searches for GRASS support files.

module-item.name: g.findfile
module-item.description: Searches for GRASS data base files and sets variables for the shell.

module-item.name: g.gisenv
module-item.description: Outputs and modifies the user's current GRASS variable settings. Prints all defined GRASS variables if no option is given.

module-item.name: g.gui
module-item.description: Launches a GRASS graphical user interface (GUI) session. Optionally updates default user interface settings.

module-item.name: g.list
module-item.description: Lists available GRASS data base files of the user-specified data type optionally using the search pattern.

module-item.name: g.manual
module-item.description: Displays the manual pages of GRASS modules.

module-item.name: g.mapset
module-item.description: Changes/reports current mapset. Optionally create new mapset or list available mapsets in given location.

module-item.name: g.mapsets
module-item.description: Modifies/prints the user's current mapset search path. Affects the user's access to data existing under the other mapsets in the current location.

module-item.name: g.message
module-item.description: Prints a message, warning, progress info, or fatal error in the GRASS way. This module should be used in scripts for messages served to user.

module-item.name: g.mkfontcap
module-item.description: Generates the font configuration file by scanning various directories for fonts.

module-item.name: g.pnmcomp
module-item.description: Overlays multiple PPM image files.

module-item.name: g.ppmtopng
module-item.description: Converts between PPM/PGM and PNG image formats.

module-item.name: g.proj
module-item.description: Prints or modifies GRASS projection information files (in various co-ordinate system descriptions). Can also be used to create new GRASS locations.

module-item.name: g.region
module-item.description: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

module-item.name: g.remove
module-item.description: Removes data base element files from the user's current mapset using the search pattern.

module-item.name: g.rename
module-item.description: Renames data base element files in the user's current mapset.

module-item.name: g.search.modules
module-item.description: Search in GRASS modules using keywords

module-item.name: g.tempfile
module-item.description: Creates a temporary file and prints it's file name.

module-item.name: g.version
module-item.description: Displays GRASS GIS version info. Optionally also prints build or copyright information.

module-item.name: i.albedo
module-item.description: Computes broad band albedo from surface reflectance.

module-item.name: i.aster.toar
module-item.description: Calculates Top of Atmosphere Radiance/Reflectance/Brightness Temperature from ASTER DN.

module-item.name: i.atcorr
module-item.description: Performs atmospheric correction using the 6S algorithm. 6S - Second Simulation of Satellite Signal in the Solar Spectrum.

module-item.name: i.biomass
module-item.description: Computes biomass growth, precursor of crop yield calculation.

module-item.name: i.cca
module-item.description: Canonical components analysis (CCA) program for image processing.

module-item.name: i.cluster
module-item.description: Generates spectral signatures for land cover types in an image using a clustering algorithm. The resulting signature file is used as input for i.maxlik, to generate an unsupervised image classification.

module-item.name: i.colors.enhance
module-item.description: Performs auto-balancing of colors for RGB images.

module-item.name: i.eb.eta
module-item.description: Actual evapotranspiration for diurnal period (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

module-item.name: i.eb.evapfr
module-item.description: Computes evaporative fraction and root zone soil moisture.

module-item.name: i.eb.hsebal01
module-item.description: Computes sensible heat flux iteration SEBAL 01.

module-item.name: i.eb.netrad
module-item.description: Net radiation approximation (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

module-item.name: i.eb.soilheatflux
module-item.description: Soil heat flux approximation (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

module-item.name: i.emissivity
module-item.description: Computes emissivity from NDVI, generic method for sparse land.

module-item.name: i.evapo.mh
module-item.description: Computes evapotranspiration calculation modified or original Hargreaves formulation, 2001.

module-item.name: i.evapo.pm
module-item.description: Computes potential evapotranspiration calculation with hourly Penman-Monteith.

module-item.name: i.evapo.pt
module-item.description: Computes evapotranspiration calculation Priestley and Taylor formulation, 1972.

module-item.name: i.evapo.time
module-item.description: Computes temporal integration of satellite ET actual (ETa) following the daily ET reference (ETo) from meteorological station(s).

module-item.name: i.fft
module-item.description: Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) for image processing.

module-item.name: i.gensig
module-item.description: Generates statistics for i.maxlik from raster map.

module-item.name: i.gensigset
module-item.description: Generates statistics for i.smap from raster map.

module-item.name: i.group
module-item.description: Creates, edits, and lists groups of imagery data.

module-item.name: i.his.rgb
module-item.description: Transforms raster maps from HIS (Hue-Intensity-Saturation) color space to RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color space.

module-item.name: i.ifft
module-item.description: Inverse Fast Fourier Transform (IFFT) for image processing.

module-item.name: i.image.mosaic
module-item.description: Mosaics several images and extends colormap.

module-item.name: i.in.spotvgt
module-item.description: Imports SPOT VGT NDVI data into a raster map.

module-item.name: i.landsat.acca
module-item.description: Performs Landsat TM/ETM+ Automatic Cloud Cover Assessment (ACCA).

module-item.name: i.landsat.toar
module-item.description: Calculates top-of-atmosphere radiance or reflectance and temperature for Landsat MSS/TM/ETM+/OLI

module-item.name: i.maxlik
module-item.description: Classifies the cell spectral reflectances in imagery data. Classification is based on the spectral signature information generated by either i.cluster, g.gui.iclass, or i.gensig.

module-item.name: i.modis.qc
module-item.description: Extracts quality control parameters from MODIS QC layers.

module-item.name: i.oif
module-item.description: Calculates Optimum-Index-Factor table for spectral bands

module-item.name: i.ortho.camera
module-item.description: Select and modify the imagery group camera reference file.

module-item.name: i.ortho.elev
module-item.description: Select or modify the target elevation model.

module-item.name: i.ortho.init
module-item.description: Interactively creates or modifies entries in a camera initial exposure station file for imagery group referenced by a sub-block.

module-item.name: i.ortho.photo
module-item.description: Menu driver for the photo imagery programs.

module-item.name: i.ortho.rectify
module-item.description: Orthorectifies an image by using the image to photo coordinate transformation matrix.

module-item.name: i.ortho.target
module-item.description: Select or modify the imagery group target.

module-item.name: i.ortho.transform
module-item.description: Computes a coordinate transformation based on the control points.

module-item.name: i.pansharpen
module-item.description: Image fusion algorithms to sharpen multispectral with high-res panchromatic channels

module-item.name: i.pca
module-item.description: Principal components analysis (PCA) for image processing.

module-item.name: i.rectify
module-item.description: Rectifies an image by computing a coordinate transformation for each pixel in the image based on the control points.

module-item.name: i.rgb.his
module-item.description: Transforms raster maps from RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color space to HIS (Hue-Intensity-Saturation) color space.

module-item.name: i.segment
module-item.description: Identifies segments (objects) from imagery data.

module-item.name: i.smap
module-item.description: Performs contextual image classification using sequential maximum a posteriori (SMAP) estimation.

module-item.name: i.spectral
module-item.description: Displays spectral response at user specified locations in group or images.

module-item.name: i.target
module-item.description: Targets an imagery group to a GRASS location and mapset.

module-item.name: i.tasscap
module-item.description: Performs Tasseled Cap (Kauth Thomas) transformation.

module-item.name: i.topo.corr
module-item.description: Computes topographic correction of reflectance.

module-item.name: i.vi
module-item.description: Calculates different types of vegetation indices. Uses red and nir bands mostly, and some indices require additional bands.

module-item.name: i.zc
module-item.description: Zero-crossing "edge detection" raster function for image processing.

module-item.name: m.cogo
module-item.description: A simple utility for converting bearing and distance measurements to coordinates and vice versa. It assumes a cartesian coordinate system

module-item.name: m.measure
module-item.description: Measures the lengths and areas of features.

module-item.name: m.nviz.image
module-item.description: Creates a 3D rendering of GIS data. Renders surfaces (raster data), 2D/3D vector data, and volumes (3D raster data) in 3D.

module-item.name: m.nviz.script
module-item.description: Creates fly-through script to run in NVIZ.

module-item.name: m.proj
module-item.description: Converts coordinates from one projection to another (cs2cs frontend).

module-item.name: m.transform
module-item.description: Computes a coordinate transformation based on the control points.

module-item.name: ps.map
module-item.description: Produces hardcopy PostScript map output.

module-item.name: r.basins.fill
module-item.description: Generates watershed subbasins raster map.

module-item.name: r.blend
module-item.description: Blends color components of two raster maps by a given ratio.

module-item.name: r.buffer
module-item.description: Creates a raster map showing buffer zones surrounding cells that contain non-NULL category values.

module-item.name: r.buffer.lowmem
module-item.description: Creates a raster map showing buffer zones surrounding cells that contain non-NULL category values. This is the low-memory alternative to the classic r.buffer module.

module-item.name: r.buildvrt
module-item.description: Build a VRT (Virtual Raster) from the list of input raster maps.

module-item.name: r.carve
module-item.description: Generates stream channels. Takes vector stream data, transforms it to raster and subtracts depth from the output DEM.

module-item.name: r.category
module-item.description: Manages category values and labels associated with user-specified raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.circle
module-item.description: Creates a raster map containing concentric rings around a given point.

module-item.name: r.clump
module-item.description: Recategorizes data in a raster map by grouping cells that form physically discrete areas into unique categories.

module-item.name: r.coin
module-item.description: Tabulates the mutual occurrence (coincidence) of categories for two raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.colors
module-item.description: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a raster map.

module-item.name: r.colors.out
module-item.description: Exports the color table associated with a raster map.

module-item.name: r.colors.stddev
module-item.description: Sets color rules based on stddev from a raster map's mean value.

module-item.name: r.composite
module-item.description: Combines red, green and blue raster maps into a single composite raster map.

module-item.name: r.compress
module-item.description: Compresses and decompresses raster maps.

module-item.name: r.contour
module-item.description: Produces a vector map of specified contours from a raster map.

module-item.name: r.cost
module-item.description: Creates a raster map showing the cumulative cost of moving between different geographic locations on an input raster map whose cell category values represent cost.

module-item.name: r.covar
module-item.description: Outputs a covariance/correlation matrix for user-specified raster map layer(s).

module-item.name: r.cross
module-item.description: Creates a cross product of the category values from multiple raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.describe
module-item.description: Prints terse list of category values found in a raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.distance
module-item.description: Locates the closest points between objects in two raster maps.

module-item.name: r.drain
module-item.description: Traces a flow through an elevation model or cost surface on a raster map.

module-item.name: r.external
module-item.description: Links GDAL supported raster data as a pseudo GRASS raster map.

module-item.name: r.external.out
module-item.description: Redirects raster output to file utilizing GDAL library rather than storing in GRASS raster format.

module-item.name: r.fill.dir
module-item.description: Filters and generates a depressionless elevation map and a flow direction map from a given elevation raster map.

module-item.name: r.fill.stats
module-item.description: Rapidly fills 'no data' cells (NULLs) of a raster map with interpolated values (IDW).

module-item.name: r.fillnulls
module-item.description: Fills no-data areas in raster maps using spline interpolation.

module-item.name: r.flow
module-item.description: Constructs flowlines. Computes flowlines, flowpath lengths, and flowaccumulation (contributing areas) from a elevation raster map.

module-item.name: r.geomorphon
module-item.description: Calculates geomorphons (terrain forms) and associated geometry using machine vision approach.

module-item.name: r.grow
module-item.description: Generates a raster map layer with contiguous areas grown by one cell.

module-item.name: r.grow.distance
module-item.description: Generates a raster map containing distances to nearest raster features and/or the value of the nearest non-null cell.

module-item.name: r.gwflow
module-item.description: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined and unconfined groundwater flow in two dimensions.

module-item.name: r.his
module-item.description: Generates red, green and blue (RGB) raster map layers combining hue, intensity and saturation (HIS) values from user-specified input raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.horizon
module-item.description: Computes horizon angle height from a digital elevation model. The module has two different modes of operation: 1. Computes the entire horizon around a single point whose coordinates are given with the 'coord' option. The horizon height (in radians). 2. Computes one or more raster maps of the horizon height in a single direction. The input for this is the angle (in degrees), which is measured counterclockwise with east=0, north=90 etc. The output is the horizon height in radians.

module-item.name: r.import
module-item.description: Imports raster data into a GRASS raster map using GDAL library and reprojects on the fly.

module-item.name: r.in.ascii
module-item.description: Converts a GRASS ASCII raster file to binary raster map.

module-item.name: r.in.aster
module-item.description: Georeference, rectify, and import Terra-ASTER imagery and relative DEMs using gdalwarp.

module-item.name: r.in.bin
module-item.description: Import a binary raster file into a GRASS raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.in.gdal
module-item.description: Imports raster data into a GRASS raster map using GDAL library.

module-item.name: r.in.gridatb
module-item.description: Imports GRIDATB.FOR map file (TOPMODEL) into a GRASS raster map.

module-item.name: r.in.lidar
module-item.description: Creates a raster map from LAS LiDAR points using univariate statistics.

module-item.name: r.in.mat
module-item.description: Imports a binary MAT-File(v4) to a GRASS raster.

module-item.name: r.in.png
module-item.description: Imports non-georeferenced PNG format image.

module-item.name: r.in.poly
module-item.description: Creates raster maps from ASCII polygon/line/point data files.

module-item.name: r.in.srtm
module-item.description: Imports SRTM HGT files into raster map.

module-item.name: r.in.wms
module-item.description: Downloads and imports data from OGC WMS and OGC WMTS web mapping servers.

module-item.name: r.in.xyz
module-item.description: Creates a raster map from an assemblage of many coordinates using univariate statistics.

module-item.name: r.info
module-item.description: Outputs basic information about a raster map.

module-item.name: r.kappa
module-item.description: Calculates error matrix and kappa parameter for accuracy assessment of classification result.

module-item.name: r.lake
module-item.description: Fills lake at given point to given level.

module-item.name: r.latlong
module-item.description: Creates a latitude/longitude raster map.

module-item.name: r.li.cwed
module-item.description: Calculates contrast weighted edge density index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.dominance
module-item.description: Calculates dominance's diversity index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.edgedensity
module-item.description: Calculates edge density index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

module-item.name: r.li.mpa
module-item.description: Calculates mean pixel attribute index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.mps
module-item.description: Calculates mean patch size index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

module-item.name: r.li.padcv
module-item.description: Calculates coefficient of variation of patch area on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.padrange
module-item.description: Calculates range of patch area size on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.padsd
module-item.description: Calculates standard deviation of patch area a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.patchdensity
module-item.description: Calculates patch density index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

module-item.name: r.li.patchnum
module-item.description: Calculates patch number index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm.

module-item.name: r.li.pielou
module-item.description: Calculates Pielou's diversity index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.renyi
module-item.description: Calculates Renyi's diversity index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.richness
module-item.description: Calculates richness index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.shannon
module-item.description: Calculates Shannon's diversity index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.shape
module-item.description: Calculates shape index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.li.simpson
module-item.description: Calculates Simpson's diversity index on a raster map

module-item.name: r.mapcalc
module-item.description: Raster map calculator.

module-item.name: r.mapcalc.simple
module-item.description: Calculates a new raster map from a simple r.mapcalc expression.

module-item.name: r.mask
module-item.description: Creates a MASK for limiting raster operation.

module-item.name: r.mfilter
module-item.description: Performs raster map matrix filter.

module-item.name: r.mode
module-item.description: Finds the mode of values in a cover map within areas assigned the same category value in a user-specified base map.

module-item.name: r.neighbors
module-item.description: Makes each cell category value a function of the category values assigned to the cells around it, and stores new cell values in an output raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.null
module-item.description: Manages NULL-values of given raster map.

module-item.name: r.out.ascii
module-item.description: Converts a raster map layer into a GRASS ASCII text file.

module-item.name: r.out.bin
module-item.description: Exports a GRASS raster to a binary array.

module-item.name: r.out.gdal
module-item.description: Exports GRASS raster maps into GDAL supported formats.

module-item.name: r.out.gridatb
module-item.description: Exports GRASS raster map to GRIDATB.FOR map file (TOPMODEL).

module-item.name: r.out.mat
module-item.description: Exports a GRASS raster to a binary MAT-File.

module-item.name: r.out.mpeg
module-item.description: Converts raster map series to MPEG movie.

module-item.name: r.out.png
module-item.description: Export a GRASS raster map as a non-georeferenced PNG image.

module-item.name: r.out.pov
module-item.description: Converts a raster map layer into a height-field file for POV-Ray.

module-item.name: r.out.ppm
module-item.description: Converts a GRASS raster map to a PPM image file.

module-item.name: r.out.ppm3
module-item.description: Converts 3 GRASS raster layers (R,G,B) to a PPM image file.

module-item.name: r.out.vrml
module-item.description: Exports a raster map to the Virtual Reality Modeling Language (VRML).

module-item.name: r.out.vtk
module-item.description: Converts raster maps into the VTK-ASCII format.

module-item.name: r.out.xyz
module-item.description: Exports a raster map to a text file as x,y,z values based on cell centers.

module-item.name: r.pack
module-item.description: Exports a raster map as GRASS GIS specific archive file

module-item.name: r.param.scale
module-item.description: Extracts terrain parameters from a DEM. Uses a multi-scale approach by taking fitting quadratic parameters to any size window (via least squares).

module-item.name: r.patch
module-item.description: Creates a composite raster map layer by using known category values from one (or more) map layer(s) to fill in areas of "no data" in another map layer.

module-item.name: r.path
module-item.description: Traces paths from starting points following input directions.

module-item.name: r.plane
module-item.description: Creates raster plane map given dip (inclination), aspect (azimuth) and one point.

module-item.name: r.profile
module-item.description: Outputs the raster map layer values lying on user-defined line(s).

module-item.name: r.proj
module-item.description: Re-projects a raster map from given location to the current location.

module-item.name: r.quant
module-item.description: Produces the quantization file for a floating-point map.

module-item.name: r.quantile
module-item.description: Compute quantiles using two passes.

module-item.name: r.random
module-item.description: Creates a raster map layer and vector point map containing randomly located points.

module-item.name: r.random.cells
module-item.description: Generates random cell values with spatial dependence.

module-item.name: r.random.surface
module-item.description: Generates random surface(s) with spatial dependence.

module-item.name: r.reclass
module-item.description: Reclassify raster map based on category values. Creates a new raster map whose category values are based upon a reclassification of the categories in an existing raster map.

module-item.name: r.reclass.area
module-item.description: Reclasses a raster map greater or less than user specified area size (in hectares).

module-item.name: r.recode
module-item.description: Recodes categorical raster maps.

module-item.name: r.region
module-item.description: Sets the boundary definitions for a raster map.

module-item.name: r.regression.line
module-item.description: Calculates linear regression from two raster maps: y = a + b*x.

module-item.name: r.regression.multi
module-item.description: Calculates multiple linear regression from raster maps.

module-item.name: r.relief
module-item.description: Creates shaded relief map from an elevation map (DEM).

module-item.name: r.report
module-item.description: Reports statistics for raster maps.

module-item.name: r.resamp.bspline
module-item.description: Performs bilinear or bicubic spline interpolation with Tykhonov regularization.

module-item.name: r.resamp.filter
module-item.description: Resamples raster map layers using an analytic kernel.

module-item.name: r.resamp.interp
module-item.description: Resamples raster map to a finer grid using interpolation.

module-item.name: r.resamp.rst
module-item.description: Reinterpolates and optionally computes topographic analysis from input raster map to a new raster map (possibly with different resolution) using regularized spline with tension and smoothing.

module-item.name: r.resamp.stats
module-item.description: Resamples raster map layers to a coarser grid using aggregation.

module-item.name: r.resample
module-item.description: GRASS raster map layer data resampling capability.

module-item.name: r.rescale
module-item.description: Rescales the range of category values in a raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.rescale.eq
module-item.description: Rescales histogram equalized the range of category values in a raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.rgb
module-item.description: Splits a raster map into red, green and blue maps.

module-item.name: r.ros
module-item.description: Generates rate of spread raster maps. Generates three, or four raster map layers showing the base (perpendicular) rate of spread (ROS), the maximum (forward) ROS, the direction of the maximum ROS, and optionally the maximum potential spotting distance for fire spread simulation.

module-item.name: r.series
module-item.description: Makes each output cell value a function of the values assigned to the corresponding cells in the input raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.series.accumulate
module-item.description: Makes each output cell value a accumulationfunction of the values assigned to the corresponding cells in the input raster map layers.

module-item.name: r.series.interp
module-item.description: Interpolates raster maps located (temporal or spatial) in between input raster maps at specific sampling positions.

module-item.name: r.shade
module-item.description: Drapes a color raster over an shaded relief or aspect map.

module-item.name: r.sim.sediment
module-item.description: Sediment transport and erosion/deposition simulation using path sampling method (SIMWE).

module-item.name: r.sim.water
module-item.description: Overland flow hydrologic simulation using path sampling method (SIMWE).

module-item.name: r.slope.aspect
module-item.description: Generates raster maps of slope, aspect, curvatures and partial derivatives from an elevation raster map. Aspect is calculated counterclockwise from east.

module-item.name: r.solute.transport
module-item.description: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined and unconfined solute transport in two dimensions

module-item.name: r.spread
module-item.description: Simulates elliptically anisotropic spread. Generates a raster map of the cumulative time of spread, given raster maps containing the rates of spread (ROS), the ROS directions and the spread origins. It optionally produces raster maps to contain backlink UTM coordinates for tracing spread paths. Usable for fire spread simulations.

module-item.name: r.spreadpath
module-item.description: Recursively traces the least cost path backwards to cells from which the cumulative cost was determined.

module-item.name: r.statistics
module-item.description: Calculates category or object oriented statistics.

module-item.name: r.stats
module-item.description: Generates area statistics for raster map.

module-item.name: r.stats.quantile
module-item.description: Compute category quantiles using two passes.

module-item.name: r.stats.zonal
module-item.description: Calculates category or object oriented statistics (accumulator-based statistics).

module-item.name: r.stream.extract
module-item.description: Performs stream network extraction.

module-item.name: r.sun
module-item.description: Solar irradiance and irradiation model. Computes direct (beam), diffuse and reflected solar irradiation raster maps for given day, latitude, surface and atmospheric conditions. Solar parameters (e.g. sunrise, sunset times, declination, extraterrestrial irradiance, daylight length) are saved in the map history file. Alternatively, a local time can be specified to compute solar incidence angle and/or irradiance raster maps. The shadowing effect of the topography is optionally incorporated.

module-item.name: r.sunhours
module-item.description: Calculates solar elevation, solar azimuth, and sun hours. Solar elevation: the angle between the direction of the geometric center of the sun's apparent disk and the (idealized) horizon. Solar azimuth: the angle from due north in clockwise direction.

module-item.name: r.sunmask
module-item.description: Calculates cast shadow areas from sun position and elevation raster map. Either exact sun position (A) is specified, or date/time to calculate the sun position (B) by r.sunmask itself.

module-item.name: r.support
module-item.description: Allows creation and/or modification of raster map layer support files.

module-item.name: r.support.stats
module-item.description: Update raster map statistics

module-item.name: r.surf.area
module-item.description: Prints estimation of surface area for raster map.

module-item.name: r.surf.contour
module-item.description: Generates surface raster map from rasterized contours.

module-item.name: r.surf.fractal
module-item.description: Creates a fractal surface of a given fractal dimension.

module-item.name: r.surf.gauss
module-item.description: Generates a raster map using gaussian random number generator. Mean and standard deviation of gaussian deviates can be expressed by the user.

module-item.name: r.surf.idw
module-item.description: Provides surface interpolation from raster point data by Inverse Distance Squared Weighting.

module-item.name: r.surf.random
module-item.description: Produces a raster surface map of uniform random deviates with defined range.

module-item.name: r.terraflow
module-item.description: Performs flow computation for massive grids.

module-item.name: r.texture
module-item.description: Generate images with textural features from a raster map.

module-item.name: r.thin
module-item.description: Thins non-null cells that denote linear features in a raster map layer.

module-item.name: r.tile
module-item.description: Splits a raster map into tiles.

module-item.name: r.tileset
module-item.description: Produces tilings of the source projection for use in the destination region and projection.

module-item.name: r.timestamp
module-item.description: Modifies a timestamp for a raster map. Print/add/remove a timestamp for a raster map.

module-item.name: r.to.rast3
module-item.description: Converts 2D raster map slices to one 3D raster volume map.

module-item.name: r.to.rast3elev
module-item.description: Creates a 3D volume map based on 2D elevation and value raster maps.

module-item.name: r.to.vect
module-item.description: Converts a raster map into a vector map.

module-item.name: r.topidx
module-item.description: Creates a topographic index (wetness index) raster map from an elevation raster map.

module-item.name: r.topmodel
module-item.description: Simulates TOPMODEL which is a physically based hydrologic model.

module-item.name: r.transect
module-item.description: Outputs raster map layer values lying along user defined transect line(s).

module-item.name: r.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells of a raster map. Statistics include number of cells counted, minimum and maximum cell values, range, arithmetic mean, population variance, standard deviation, coefficient of variation, and sum.

module-item.name: r.unpack
module-item.description: Imports a GRASS GIS specific raster archive file (packed with r.pack) as a raster map

module-item.name: r.uslek
module-item.description: Computes USLE Soil Erodibility Factor (K).

module-item.name: r.usler
module-item.description: Computes USLE R factor, Rainfall erosivity index.

module-item.name: r.viewshed
module-item.description: Computes the viewshed of a point on an elevation raster map. Default format: NULL (invisible), vertical angle wrt viewpoint (visible).

module-item.name: r.volume
module-item.description: Calculates the volume of data "clumps". Optionally produces a GRASS vector points map containing the calculated centroids of these clumps.

module-item.name: r.walk
module-item.description: Creates a raster map showing the anisotropic cumulative cost of moving between different geographic locations on an input raster map whose cell category values represent cost.

module-item.name: r.water.outlet
module-item.description: Creates watershed basins from a drainage direction map.

module-item.name: r.watershed
module-item.description: Calculates hydrological parameters and RUSLE factors.

module-item.name: r.what
module-item.description: Queries raster maps on their category values and category labels.

module-item.name: r.what.color
module-item.description: Queries colors for a raster map layer.

module-item.name: r3.colors
module-item.description: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a 3D raster map.

module-item.name: r3.colors.out
module-item.description: Exports the color table associated with a 3D raster map.

module-item.name: r3.cross.rast
module-item.description: Creates cross section 2D raster map from 3D raster map based on 2D elevation map

module-item.name: r3.flow
module-item.description: Computes 3D flow lines and 3D flow accumulation.

module-item.name: r3.gradient
module-item.description: Computes gradient of a 3D raster map and outputs gradient components as three 3D raster maps.

module-item.name: r3.gwflow
module-item.description: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined groundwater flow in three dimensions.

module-item.name: r3.in.ascii
module-item.description: Converts a 3D ASCII raster text file into a (binary) 3D raster map.

module-item.name: r3.in.bin
module-item.description: Imports a binary raster file into a GRASS 3D raster map.

module-item.name: r3.in.lidar
module-item.description: Creates a 3D raster map from LAS LiDAR points using univariate statistics.

module-item.name: r3.in.v5d
module-item.description: Import 3-dimensional Vis5D files.

module-item.name: r3.in.xyz
module-item.description: Create a 3D raster map from an assemblage of many coordinates using univariate statistics

module-item.name: r3.info
module-item.description: Outputs basic information about a user-specified 3D raster map layer.

module-item.name: r3.mapcalc
module-item.description: Raster map calculator.

module-item.name: r3.mask
module-item.description: Establishes the current working 3D raster mask.

module-item.name: r3.mkdspf
module-item.description: Creates a display file from an existing 3D raster map according to specified threshold levels.

module-item.name: r3.neighbors
module-item.description: Makes each voxel value a function of the values assigned to the voxels around it, and stores new voxel values in an output 3D raster map

module-item.name: r3.null
module-item.description: Explicitly create the 3D NULL-value bitmap file.

module-item.name: r3.out.ascii
module-item.description: Converts a 3D raster map layer into a ASCII text file.

module-item.name: r3.out.bin
module-item.description: Exports a GRASS 3D raster map to a binary array.

module-item.name: r3.out.v5d
module-item.description: Exports GRASS 3D raster map to 3-dimensional Vis5D file.

module-item.name: r3.out.vtk
module-item.description: Converts 3D raster maps into the VTK-ASCII format.

module-item.name: r3.retile
module-item.description: Retiles an existing 3D raster map with user defined x, y and z tile size.

module-item.name: r3.stats
module-item.description: Generates volume statistics for 3D raster maps.

module-item.name: r3.support
module-item.description: Allows creation and/or modification of 3D raster map layer support files.

module-item.name: r3.timestamp
module-item.description: Modifies a timestamp for a 3D raster map. Print/add/remove a timestamp for a 3D raster map.

module-item.name: r3.to.rast
module-item.description: Converts 3D raster maps to 2D raster maps

module-item.name: r3.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells of a 3D raster map. Statistics include number of cells counted, minimum and maximum cell values, range, arithmetic mean, population variance, standard deviation, coefficient of variation, and sum.

module-item.name: t.connect
module-item.description: Prints/sets general temporal GIS database connection for current mapset.

module-item.name: t.create
module-item.description: Creates a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.info
module-item.description: Lists information about space time datasets and maps.

module-item.name: t.list
module-item.description: Lists space time datasets and maps registered in the temporal database.

module-item.name: t.merge
module-item.description: Merges several space time datasets into a single space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.accdetect
module-item.description: Detects accumulation patterns in temporally accumulated space time raster datasets created by t.rast.accumulate.

module-item.name: t.rast.accumulate
module-item.description: Computes cyclic accumulations of a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.aggregate
module-item.description: Aggregates temporally the maps of a space time raster dataset by a user defined granularity.

module-item.name: t.rast.aggregate.ds
module-item.description: Aggregates data of an existing space time raster dataset using the time intervals of a second space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.algebra
module-item.description: Apply temporal and spatial operations on space time raster datasets using temporal raster algebra.

module-item.name: t.rast.colors
module-item.description: Creates/modifies the color table associated with each raster map of the space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.contour
module-item.description: Produces a space time vector dataset of specified contours from a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.export
module-item.description: Exports space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.extract
module-item.description: Extracts a subset of a space time raster datasets.

module-item.name: t.rast.gapfill
module-item.description: Replaces gaps in a space time raster dataset with interpolated raster maps.

module-item.name: t.rast.import
module-item.description: Imports space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.list
module-item.description: Lists registered maps of a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.mapcalc
module-item.description: Performs spatio-temporal mapcalc expressions on temporally sampled maps of space time raster datasets.

module-item.name: t.rast.neighbors
module-item.description: Performs a neighborhood analysis for each map in a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.out.vtk
module-item.description: Exports space time raster dataset as VTK time series.

module-item.name: t.rast.series
module-item.description: Performs different aggregation algorithms from r.series on all or a subset of raster maps in a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.to.rast3
module-item.description: Converts a space time raster dataset into a 3D raster map.

module-item.name: t.rast.to.vect
module-item.description: Converts a space time raster dataset into a space time vector dataset

module-item.name: t.rast.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells for each registered raster map of a space time raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast.what
module-item.description: Sample a space time raster dataset at specific vector point coordinates and write the output to stdout using different layouts

module-item.name: t.rast3d.algebra
module-item.description: Apply temporal and spatial operations on space time 3D raster datasets using temporal 3D raster algebra.

module-item.name: t.rast3d.extract
module-item.description: Extracts a subset of a space time 3D raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast3d.list
module-item.description: Lists registered maps of a space time raster3d dataset.

module-item.name: t.rast3d.mapcalc
module-item.description: Performs r3.mapcalc expressions on maps of sampled space time 3D raster datasets.

module-item.name: t.rast3d.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells for each registered 3D raster map of a space time 3D raster dataset.

module-item.name: t.register
module-item.description: Assigns timestamps and registers raster, vector and raster3d maps in a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.remove
module-item.description: Removes space time datasets from temporal database.

module-item.name: t.rename
module-item.description: Renames a space time dataset

module-item.name: t.sample
module-item.description: Samples the input space time dataset(s) with a sample space time dataset and print the result to stdout.

module-item.name: t.select
module-item.description: Select maps from space time datasets by topological relationships to other space time datasets using temporal algebra.

module-item.name: t.shift
module-item.description: Shifts temporally the maps of a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.snap
module-item.description: Snaps temporally the maps of a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.support
module-item.description: Modifies the metadata of a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.topology
module-item.description: Lists temporal topology of a space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.unregister
module-item.description: Unregisters raster, vector and raster3d maps from the temporal database or a specific space time dataset.

module-item.name: t.vect.algebra
module-item.description: Apply temporal and spatial operations on space time vector datasets using temporal vector algebra.

module-item.name: t.vect.db.select
module-item.description: Prints attributes of vector maps registered in a space time vector dataset.

module-item.name: t.vect.export
module-item.description: Exports a space time vector dataset as GRASS GIS specific archive file.

module-item.name: t.vect.extract
module-item.description: Extracts a subset of a space time vector dataset.

module-item.name: t.vect.import
module-item.description: Imports a space time vector dataset from a GRASS GIS specific archive file.

module-item.name: t.vect.list
module-item.description: Lists registered maps of a space time vector dataset.

module-item.name: t.vect.observe.strds
module-item.description: Observes specific locations in a space time raster dataset over a period of time using vector points.

module-item.name: t.vect.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics of attributes for each registered vector map of a space time vector dataset

module-item.name: t.vect.what.strds
module-item.description: Stores raster map values at spatial and temporal positions of vector points as vector attributes.

module-item.name: test.r3flow
module-item.description: Testing flow lines.

module-item.name: test.raster3d.lib
module-item.description: Performs unit and integration tests for the raster3d library

module-item.name: v.buffer
module-item.description: Creates a buffer around vector features of given type.

module-item.name: v.build
module-item.description: Creates topology for vector map. Optionally also checks for topological errors.

module-item.name: v.build.all
module-item.description: Rebuilds topology on all vector maps in the current mapset.

module-item.name: v.build.polylines
module-item.description: Builds polylines from lines or boundaries.

module-item.name: v.category
module-item.description: Attaches, deletes or reports vector categories to/from/of map geometry.

module-item.name: v.centroids
module-item.description: Adds missing centroids to closed boundaries.

module-item.name: v.class
module-item.description: Classifies attribute data, e.g. for thematic mapping

module-item.name: v.clean
module-item.description: Toolset for cleaning topology of vector map.

module-item.name: v.clip
module-item.description: Extracts features of input map which overlay features of clip map.

module-item.name: v.cluster
module-item.description: Performs cluster identification.

module-item.name: v.colors
module-item.description: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a vector map.

module-item.name: v.colors.out
module-item.description: Exports the color table associated with a vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.addcolumn
module-item.description: Adds one or more columns to the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.addtable
module-item.description: Creates and connects a new attribute table to a given layer of an existing vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.connect
module-item.description: Prints/sets DB connection for a vector map to attribute table.

module-item.name: v.db.dropcolumn
module-item.description: Drops a column from the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.droprow
module-item.description: Removes a vector feature from a vector map through attribute selection.

module-item.name: v.db.droptable
module-item.description: Removes existing attribute table of a vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.join
module-item.description: Joins a database table to a vector map table.

module-item.name: v.db.reconnect.all
module-item.description: Reconnects attribute tables for all vector maps from the current mapset to a new database.

module-item.name: v.db.renamecolumn
module-item.description: Renames a column in the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.select
module-item.description: Prints vector map attributes.

module-item.name: v.db.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics on selected table column for a GRASS vector map.

module-item.name: v.db.update
module-item.description: Updates a column in the attribute table connected to a vector map.

module-item.name: v.decimate
module-item.description: Decimates a point cloud Copies points from one vector to another while applying different decimations

module-item.name: v.delaunay
module-item.description: Creates a Delaunay triangulation from an input vector map containing points or centroids.

module-item.name: v.dissolve
module-item.description: Dissolves boundaries between adjacent areas sharing a common category number or attribute.

module-item.name: v.distance
module-item.description: Finds the nearest element in vector map 'to' for elements in vector map 'from'.

module-item.name: v.drape
module-item.description: Converts 2D vector features to 3D by sampling of elevation raster map.

module-item.name: v.edit
module-item.description: Edits a vector map, allows adding, deleting and modifying selected vector features.

module-item.name: v.external
module-item.description: Creates a new pseudo-vector map as a link to an OGR-supported layer or a PostGIS feature table.

module-item.name: v.external.out
module-item.description: Defines vector output format.

module-item.name: v.extract
module-item.description: Selects vector features from an existing vector map and creates a new vector map containing only the selected features.

module-item.name: v.extrude
module-item.description: Extrudes flat vector features to 3D vector features with defined height. Optionally the height can be derived from sampling of elevation raster map.

module-item.name: v.generalize
module-item.description: Performs vector based generalization.

module-item.name: v.hull
module-item.description: Produces a 2D/3D convex hull for a given vector map.

module-item.name: v.import
module-item.description: Imports vector data into a GRASS vector map using OGR library and reprojects on the fly.

module-item.name: v.in.ascii
module-item.description: Creates a vector map from an ASCII points file or ASCII vector file.

module-item.name: v.in.db
module-item.description: Creates new vector (points) map from database table containing coordinates.

module-item.name: v.in.dxf
module-item.description: Converts file in DXF format to GRASS vector map.

module-item.name: v.in.e00
module-item.description: Imports E00 file into a vector map.

module-item.name: v.in.geonames
module-item.description: Imports geonames.org country files into a vector points map.

module-item.name: v.in.lidar
module-item.description: Converts LAS LiDAR point clouds to a GRASS vector map with libLAS.

module-item.name: v.in.lines
module-item.description: Imports ASCII x,y[,z] coordinates as a series of lines.

module-item.name: v.in.mapgen
module-item.description: Imports Mapgen or Matlab-ASCII vector maps into GRASS.

module-item.name: v.in.ogr
module-item.description: Imports vector data into a GRASS vector map using OGR library.

module-item.name: v.in.region
module-item.description: Creates a vector polygon from the current region extent.

module-item.name: v.in.wfs
module-item.description: Imports GetFeature from a WFS server.

module-item.name: v.info
module-item.description: Outputs basic information about a vector map.

module-item.name: v.kcv
module-item.description: Randomly partition points into test/train sets.

module-item.name: v.kernel
module-item.description: Generates a raster density map from vector points map. Density is computed using a moving kernel. Optionally generates a vector density map on a vector network.

module-item.name: v.label
module-item.description: Creates paint labels for a vector map from attached attributes.

module-item.name: v.label.sa
module-item.description: Create optimally placed labels for vector map(s)

module-item.name: v.lidar.correction
module-item.description: Corrects the v.lidar.growing output. It is the last of the three algorithms for LIDAR filtering.

module-item.name: v.lidar.edgedetection
module-item.description: Detects the object's edges from a LIDAR data set.

module-item.name: v.lidar.growing
module-item.description: Building contour determination and Region Growing algorithm for determining the building inside

module-item.name: v.lrs.create
module-item.description: Creates a linear reference system.

module-item.name: v.lrs.label
module-item.description: Creates stationing from input lines, and linear reference system.

module-item.name: v.lrs.segment
module-item.description: Creates points/segments from input lines, linear reference system and positions read from stdin or a file.

module-item.name: v.lrs.where
module-item.description: Finds line id and real km+offset for given points in vector map using linear reference system.

module-item.name: v.mkgrid
module-item.description: Creates a vector map of a user-defined grid.

module-item.name: v.neighbors
module-item.description: Neighborhood analysis tool for vector point maps. Makes each cell value a function of the attribute values assigned to the vector points or centroids around it, and stores new cell values in an output raster map.

module-item.name: v.net
module-item.description: Performs network maintenance.

module-item.name: v.net.alloc
module-item.description: Allocates subnets for nearest centers. Center node must be opened (costs >= 0). Costs of center node are used in calculation.

module-item.name: v.net.allpairs
module-item.description: Computes the shortest path between all pairs of nodes in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.bridge
module-item.description: Computes bridges and articulation points in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.centrality
module-item.description: Computes degree, centrality, betweeness, closeness and eigenvector centrality measures in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.components
module-item.description: Computes strongly and weakly connected components in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.connectivity
module-item.description: Computes vertex connectivity between two sets of nodes in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.distance
module-item.description: Computes shortest distance via the network between the given sets of features. Finds the shortest paths from each 'from' point to the nearest 'to' feature and various information about this relation are uploaded to the attribute table.

module-item.name: v.net.flow
module-item.description: Computes the maximum flow between two sets of nodes in the network.

module-item.name: v.net.iso
module-item.description: Splits subnets for nearest centers by cost isolines. Splits net to bands between cost isolines (direction from center). Center node must be opened (costs >= 0). Costs of center node are used in calculation.

module-item.name: v.net.path
module-item.description: Finds shortest path on vector network.

module-item.name: v.net.salesman
module-item.description: Creates a cycle connecting given nodes (Traveling salesman problem). Note that TSP is NP-hard, heuristic algorithm is used by this module and created cycle may be sub optimal

module-item.name: v.net.spanningtree
module-item.description: Computes minimum spanning tree for the network.

module-item.name: v.net.steiner
module-item.description: Creates Steiner tree for the network and given terminals. Note that 'Minimum Steiner Tree' problem is NP-hard and heuristic algorithm is used in this module so the result may be sub optimal.

module-item.name: v.net.timetable
module-item.description: Finds shortest path using timetables.

module-item.name: v.net.visibility
module-item.description: Performs visibility graph construction.

module-item.name: v.normal
module-item.description: Tests for normality for vector points.

module-item.name: v.out.ascii
module-item.description: Exports a vector map to a GRASS ASCII vector representation. By default only features with category are exported. To export all features use 'layer=-1'.

module-item.name: v.out.dxf
module-item.description: Exports vector map to DXF file format.

module-item.name: v.out.lidar
module-item.description: Exports vector points as LAS point cloud Converts LAS LiDAR point clouds to a GRASS vector map with libLAS

module-item.name: v.out.ogr
module-item.description: Exports a vector map layer to any of the supported OGR vector formats. By default a vector map layer is exported to OGC GeoPackage format.

module-item.name: v.out.postgis
module-item.description: Exports a vector map layer to PostGIS feature table.

module-item.name: v.out.pov
module-item.description: Converts GRASS x,y,z points to POV-Ray x,z,y format.

module-item.name: v.out.svg
module-item.description: Exports a vector map to SVG file.

module-item.name: v.out.vtk
module-item.description: Converts a vector map to VTK ASCII output.

module-item.name: v.outlier
module-item.description: Removes outliers from vector point data.

module-item.name: v.overlay
module-item.description: Overlays two vector maps offering clip, intersection, difference, symmetrical difference, union operators.

module-item.name: v.pack
module-item.description: Exports a vector map as GRASS GIS specific archive file

module-item.name: v.parallel
module-item.description: Creates parallel line to input vector lines.

module-item.name: v.patch
module-item.description: Creates a new vector map by combining other vector maps.

module-item.name: v.perturb
module-item.description: Random location perturbations of vector points.

module-item.name: v.profile
module-item.description: Vector map profiling tool

module-item.name: v.proj
module-item.description: Re-projects a vector map from one location to the current location.

module-item.name: v.qcount
module-item.description: Indices for quadrat counts of vector point lists.

module-item.name: v.random
module-item.description: Generates random 2D/3D vector points.

module-item.name: v.rast.stats
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics from a raster map based on a vector map and uploads statistics to new attribute columns.

module-item.name: v.reclass
module-item.description: Changes vector category values for an existing vector map according to results of SQL queries or a value in attribute table column.

module-item.name: v.rectify
module-item.description: Rectifies a vector by computing a coordinate transformation for each object in the vector based on the control points.

module-item.name: v.report
module-item.description: Reports geometry statistics for vector maps.

module-item.name: v.sample
module-item.description: Samples a raster map at vector point locations.

module-item.name: v.segment
module-item.description: Creates points/segments from input vector lines and positions.

module-item.name: v.select
module-item.description: Selects features from vector map (A) by features from other vector map (B).

module-item.name: v.split
module-item.description: Splits vector lines to shorter segments.

module-item.name: v.support
module-item.description: Updates vector map metadata.

module-item.name: v.surf.bspline
module-item.description: Performs bicubic or bilinear spline interpolation with Tykhonov regularization.

module-item.name: v.surf.idw
module-item.description: Provides surface interpolation from vector point data by Inverse Distance Squared Weighting.

module-item.name: v.surf.rst
module-item.description: Performs surface interpolation from vector points map by splines. Spatial approximation and topographic analysis from given point or isoline data in vector format to floating point raster format using regularized spline with tension.

module-item.name: v.timestamp
module-item.description: Modifies a timestamp for a vector map. Print/add/remove a timestamp for a vector map.

module-item.name: v.to.3d
module-item.description: Performs transformation of 2D vector features to 3D.

module-item.name: v.to.db
module-item.description: Populates attribute values from vector features.

module-item.name: v.to.lines
module-item.description: Converts vector polygons or points to lines.

module-item.name: v.to.points
module-item.description: Creates points along input lines in new vector map with 2 layers.

module-item.name: v.to.rast
module-item.description: Converts (rasterize) a vector map into a raster map.

module-item.name: v.to.rast3
module-item.description: Converts a vector map (only points) into a 3D raster map.

module-item.name: v.transform
module-item.description: Performs an affine transformation (shift, scale and rotate) on vector map.

module-item.name: v.type
module-item.description: Changes type of vector features.

module-item.name: v.univar
module-item.description: Calculates univariate statistics of vector map features. Variance and standard deviation is calculated only for points if specified.

module-item.name: v.unpack
module-item.description: Imports a GRASS GIS specific vector archive file (packed with v.pack) as a vector map

module-item.name: v.vect.stats
module-item.description: Count points in areas, calculate statistics from point attributes.

module-item.name: v.vol.rst
module-item.description: Interpolates point data to a 3D raster map using regularized spline with tension (RST) algorithm.

module-item.name: v.voronoi
module-item.description: Creates a Voronoi diagram constrained to the extents of the current region from an input vector map containing points or centroids.

module-item.name: v.what
module-item.description: Queries a vector map at given locations.

module-item.name: v.what.rast
module-item.description: Uploads raster values at positions of vector points to the table.

module-item.name: v.what.rast3
module-item.description: Uploads 3D raster values at positions of vector points to the table.

module-item.name: v.what.strds
module-item.description: Uploads space time raster dataset values at positions of vector points to the table.

module-item.name: v.what.vect
module-item.description: Uploads vector values at positions of vector points to the table.

module-item.name: wxpyimgview
module-item.description: Views BMP images from the PNG driver.
